casebody.data:
No. 1594,

Misc.

Riordan v. Division of Motor Vehicles, Department of Law and Public Safety. Mark F. Hughes, Jr., for petitioner. Arthur J. Sills, Attorney General of New Jersey, Elias Abelson, Assistant Attorney General, and Thaddeus C. Raczkowski, Deputy Attorney General, for respondent.

Sup. Ct. N. J. Certiorari denied.
